description.value: Whenever Suffering Blood Loss, only test to avoid death every five rounds, instead of every round. DH 2E: Whenever character would suffer Fatigue due to Blood Loss can make a +0 Willpower Test, if successful they do not suffer Fatigue. (note, Blood Loss doesn't kill in DH 2E)
